data.title: Young Writers Camps
data.meta_description: Welcome to the Young Writers Camps Website for the
data.text:
Welcome to the Young Writers Camps Website for the Denver Writing Project!

Registration for the 2024 Denver Writing Project Young Writers Camps is Now Open!

Do you love to write? Are you a poet, storywriter, or a future famous author? Spend a fun-filled week of summer with other young writers exploring and developing your own creative voice in an environment sure to inspire!

Young Writers Camp at CU Denver Auraria Campus

When: Monday, June 10th - Friday, June14th; 9am - 3pm

Where: The University of Colorado Denver, Auraria Campus, King Center, 855 Lawrence Way, Denver, CO 80204

Who: Young Writers Entering 3rd grade - 12th grades

CLICK HERE TO REGISTER

North Young Writers Camp Registration is Now Open!

When: Monday, June 3rd - Friday, June 7th; 9am - 3pm

Where: Mandalay Middle School, 9651 N. Pierce Street, Westminster, CO 80021

Who: Young Writers Entering 7th - 10th grades

CLICK HERE TO REGISTER

Cherry Creek Young Writers Camp Registration is Now Open

When: Monday, July 15th - Friday, July 19th; 12pm - 3pm

Where: Dry Creek Elementary, 7686 E Hinsdale Ave, Centennial, CO 80112

Who: Young Writers Entering 3rd - 6th grades

CLICK HERE TO REGISTER
